QuestData.Title: Regrowth of the Grove
QuestData.Description:
The grove thrives, my mortal friend, but there is yet room for it to grow.
With enough anima, it can nourish even more wildseeds at once. Each one is a spirit that might otherwise be lost forever.
Speak with Zayhad once again, and see to the regrowth of the conservatory.
QuestData.LogDescription: Upgrade the Queen's Conservatory to Tier Three.
QuestData.RewardText: Your efforts revitalize the grove, and with it, countless spirits in need of aid.
